alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 8:21AM CDT until June 08 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COMANCHE...SOUTHERN GRADY AND SOUTHEASTERN CADDO COUNTIES... At 820 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Agawam, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Rush Springs, Cyril, Alex, Cement, Norge, Bradley, Tabler, Agawam, Ninnekah and Acme. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
